videoSnippet.title: Go for the Jugular! || Carlsen vs Caruana || CCI (2020)
videoSnippet.description:
Follow me on Instagram and Twitter for extra content and notifications https://twitter.com/agadmator
https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/
 
Magnus Carlsen vs Fabiano Caruana
Clutch Chess International (2020), 14.6.2020, GAME 12
English, Bremen, Smyslov system (A22)

1. c4 e5 2. Nc3 Nf6 3. g3 Bb4 4. e4 Bxc3 5. bxc3 O-O 6. f3 b5 7. d4 exd4 8. cxd4 bxc4 9. e5 Nd5 10. Bxc4 Bb7 11. Nh3 d6 12. O-O Nd7 13. Re1 dxe5 14. dxe5 N7b6 15. Bb3 Qe7 16. e6 fxe6 17. Ng5 Rf6 18. Qc2 Rg6 19. Rxe6 Qxe6 20. Nxe6 Rxe6 21. Bb2 Rae8 22. Bd4 Kh8 23. Qf5 Bc8 24. Qh5 c5 25. Bxc5 Re5 26. Qf7 Bh3 27. Bf8 Re1+ 28. Rxe1 Rxe1+ 29. Kf2 Rf1+ 30. Ke2 Nc3+ 31. Kd3

The $265,000 Clutch Chess International is an 8-player knockout taking place from 6-14 June, 2020, with World Champion Magnus Carlsen the top seed. Each match consists of 12 games, but with the twist that games 5-6 are worth double the points and games 11-12 triple. The "clutch" games have an extra $10,000 at stake in each match, with prizes rolled over if the games end in draws.

The time control is 10 minutes per player for all moves, with a 5 second per move increment from move 1. No draw offers are allowed before move 60. The event is organised by the Saint Louis Chess Club with the games played on lichess. Official website: uschesschamps.com

judgment.name: Inaccuracy
judgment.comment: Checkmate is now unavoidable. Rg5 was best.
